items.name: sdc-security.policy_role_safety_valve
service_triggers
items.value: [{"enabled":true,"expressionEditorConfig":{"action":"health:bad","attributeConditions":[{"name":"category","operator":"=","value":"SERVICE"}],"conditions":[{"func":"max","metricExpression":"queries_successful_rate/queries_ingested_rate","operator":"<","value":"0.925"}]},"streamThreshold":0,"suppressed":true,"triggerExpression":"IF (SELECT queries_successful_rate/queries_ingested_rate WHERE serviceName=$SERVICENAME AND max(queries_successful_rate/queries_ingested_rate) < 0.925 AND category = \"SERVICE\") DO health:bad","triggerName":"Query Failure Rate","validityWindowInMs":120000},{"enabled":true,"expressionEditorConfig":null,"streamThreshold":20,"suppressed":false,"triggerExpression":"IF (select query_duration from IMPALA_QUERIES where service_name = $SERVICENAME and query_duration >= 15m) DO health:bad","triggerName":"Long Running Queries","validityWindowInMs":120000},{"enabled":true,"expressionEditorConfig":{"action":"health:bad","attributeConditions":[],"conditions":[{"func":"min","metricExpression":"total_num_queries_rate_across_impalads","operator":">","value":"3"}]},"streamThreshold":0,"suppressed":false,"triggerExpression":"IF (SELECT total_num_queries_rate_across_impalads WHERE serviceName=$SERVICENAME AND min(total_num_queries_rate_across_impalads) > 3) DO health:bad","triggerName":"Queries Executing","validityWindowInMs":300000}]

    Max size in characters for output data.
  </description></property>

items.name: service_triggers
items.value: [{"enabled":false,"expressionEditorConfig":{"action":"health:bad","attributeConditions":[],"conditions":[{"func":"last","metricExpression":"channel_fill_percentage","operator":">","value":"90"}]},"streamThreshold":0,"suppressed":false,"triggerExpression":"IF (SELECT channel_fill_percentage WHERE serviceName=$SERVICENAME AND last(channel_fill_percentage) > 90) DO health:bad","triggerName":"Channel Fill Percent"}]

items.name: agent_config_file
items.value:
# Backup of flume.conf that is set in CM
#  DECLARE
	agent.sources = ArchiveFastlySource BitsSource BetaSource DownloadsSource
	agent.channels = ArchiveFastlyChannel BitsChannel BetaChannel DownloadsChannel
	agent.sinks = ArchiveFastlySink BitsSink BetaSink DownloadsSink
# DEFINE SOURCES
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.spoolDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/archive-fastly/spool
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.decodeErrorPolicy = REPLACE
	agent.sources.BitsSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.BitsSource.spoolDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/bits/spool
	agent.sources.BitsSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.BetaSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.BetaSource.spoolDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/beta/spool
	agent.sources.BetaSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.spoolDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/downloads/spool
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.batchSize = 10000
# DEFINE INTERCEPTORS
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors = ArchiveFastlyStaticInterceptor ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyStaticInterceptor.type = static
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = \\w+, (\\d+ \\w+ \\d+ \\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d GMT)
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.interceptors.ArchiveFastlyDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss ZZZ
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors = BitsStaticInterceptor BitsDateExtractorInterceptor
  agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.type = static
  agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
  agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d [+-]\\d\\d\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm:ss Z
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors = BetaStaticInterceptor BetaDateExtractorInterceptor
  agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.type = static
  agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
  agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d [+-]\\d\\d\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm:ss Z
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors = DownloadsStaticInterceptor DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor
  agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.type = static
  agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
  agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm
# DEFINE CHANNELS
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.capacity = 5000000
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/archive-fastly/checkpoint
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/flume/download_logs/archive-fastly/data
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.ArchiveFastlyChannel.write-timeout = 60
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/bits/checkpoint
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/flume/download_logs/bits/data
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/beta/checkpoint
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/flume/download_logs/beta/data
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/flume/download_logs/downloads/checkpoint
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/flume/download_logs/downloads/data
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
# DEFINE SINKS
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.path = /data/raw/fact/download_logs/archive-fastly/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.fileType = CompressedStream
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.codeC = bzip2
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.rollInterval = 300
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.kerberosPrincipal = $KERBEROS_PRINCIPAL
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.kerberosKeytab = REDACTED
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.hdfs.proxyUser = flume
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.path = /data/raw/fact/download_logs/bits/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.kerberosPrincipal = $KERBEROS_PRINCIPAL
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.kerberosKeytab = REDACTED
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.proxyUser = flume
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.path = /data/raw/fact/download_logs/beta/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.kerberosPrincipal = $KERBEROS_PRINCIPAL
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.kerberosKeytab = REDACTED
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.proxyUser = flume
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.path = /data/raw/fact/download_logs/downloads/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.kerberosPrincipal = $KERBEROS_PRINCIPAL
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.kerberosKeytab = REDACTED
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.proxyUser = flume
# CONNECT
	agent.sources.ArchiveFastlySource.channels = ArchiveFastlyChannel
	agent.sinks.ArchiveFastlySink.channel = ArchiveFastlyChannel
	agent.sources.BitsSource.channels = BitsChannel
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.channel = BitsChannel
	agent.sources.BetaSource.channels = BetaChannel
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.channel = BetaChannel
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.channels = DownloadsChannel
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.channel = DownloadsChannel

items.name: agent_config_file
items.value:
#  DECLARE
#	agent.sources = ArchiveSource ArchiveCloudFrontSource BitsSource BetaSource DownloadsSource RepositorySource
#	agent.channels = ArchiveChannel ArchiveCloudFrontChannel BitsChannel BetaChannel DownloadsChannel RepositoryChannel
#	agent.sinks = ArchiveSink ArchiveCloudFrontSink BitsSink BetaSink DownloadsSink RepositorySink
	agent.sources = ArchiveCloudFrontSource BitsSource BetaSource DownloadsSource
	agent.channels = ArchiveCloudFrontChannel BitsChannel BetaChannel DownloadsChannel
	agent.sinks = ArchiveCloudFrontSink BitsSink BetaSink DownloadsSink
# DEFINE SOURCES
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.type = spooldir
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.spoolDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/archive
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.spoolDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/archive-cf
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.BitsSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.BitsSource.spoolDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/bits
	agent.sources.BitsSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.BetaSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.BetaSource.spoolDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/beta
	agent.sources.BetaSource.batchSize = 10000
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.type = spooldir
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.spoolDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/downloads
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.batchSize = 10000
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.type = spooldir
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.spoolDir = /data/2/DLStats_Flume/repository
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.batchSize = 10000
# DEFINE INTERCEPTORS
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors = ArchiveStaticInterceptor ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveStaticInterceptor.type = static
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveStaticInterceptor.value = 1
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
#	agent.sources.ArchiveSource.interceptors.ArchiveDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors = ArchiveCloudFrontStaticInterceptor ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontStaticInterceptor.type = static
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d\\d\\d-\\d\\d-\\d\\d\\s+\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.ArchiveCloudFrontSource.interceptors.ArchiveCloudFrontDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = yyyy-MM-dd	HH:mm:ss
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors = BitsStaticInterceptor BitsDateExtractorInterceptor
    agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.type = static
    agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
    agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d [+-]\\d\\d\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.BitsSource.interceptors.BitsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm:ss Z
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors = BetaStaticInterceptor BetaDateExtractorInterceptor
    agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.type = static
    agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
    agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d [+-]\\d\\d\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.BetaSource.interceptors.BetaDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm:ss Z
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors = DownloadsStaticInterceptor DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor
    agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.type = static
    agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
    agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsStaticInterceptor.value = 1
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
	agent.sources.DownloadsSource.interceptors.DownloadsDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors = RepositoryStaticInterceptor RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryStaticInterceptor.type = static
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryStaticInterceptor.key = *COTT REDACTED*
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryStaticInterceptor.value = 1
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.type = regex_extractor
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.regex = (\\d\\d/\\D\\D\\D/\\d\\d\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers = s1
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.type = org.apache.flume.interceptor.RegexExtractorInterceptorMillisSerializer
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.name = timestamp
#	agent.sources.RepositorySource.interceptors.RepositoryDateExtractorInterceptor.serializers.s1.pattern = dd/MMM/yyyy:HH:mm
# DEFINE CHANNELS
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.type = file
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.capacity = 5000000
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/archive
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/data/archive
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
#	agent.channels.ArchiveChannel.write-timeout = 60
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.capacity = 5000000
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/archive-cf
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/data/archive-cf
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.ArchiveCloudFrontChannel.write-timeout = 60
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/bits
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/data/bits
	agent.channels.BitsChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/beta
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/data/beta
	agent.channels.BetaChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.type = file
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.capacity = 1000000
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.checkpointDir = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/downloads
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.dataDirs = /data/1/DLStats_Flume/data/downloads
	agent.channels.DownloadsChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
#	agent.channels.RepositoryChannel.type = file
#	agent.channels.RepositoryChannel.capacity = 5000000
#	agent.channels.RepositoryChannel.checkpointDir = /data/2/DLStats_Flume/checkpoint/repository
#	agent.channels.RepositoryChannel.dataDirs = /data/2/DLStats_Flume/data/repository
#	agent.channels.RepositoryChannel.transactionCapacity = 10000
# DEFINE SINKS
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.type = hdfs
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.path = /user/cops/DLStats/archive/%Y/%m/%d
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.fileType = CompressedStream
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.codeC = bzip2
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
#	agent.sinks.ArchiveSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.path = /user/cops/DLStats/archive-cf/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.fileType = CompressedStream
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.codeC = bzip2
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.ArchiveCloudFrontSink.hdfs.rollInterval = 300
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.path = /user/cops/DLStats/bits/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.BitsSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.path = /user/cops/DLStats/beta/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.rollSize = 268435456
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.rollCount = 0
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.BetaSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.type = hdfs
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.path = /user/cops/DLStats/downloads/%Y/%m/%d
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.inUsePrefix = .
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream

	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.batchSize = 5000
	agent.sinks.DownloadsSink.hdfs.idleTimeout = 600
